name: Dick Tracy
description:
RETRACE THE STEPS OF DICK TRACY, THE WORLD FAMOUS COMIC STRIP DETECTIVE, IN THIS SUPERB COMPUTER CONVERSION OF THE BLOCK BUSTER MOVIE.

It's time to take on the mob which has sworn to get you! Grab that famous hat and coat and hit the streets in search of Big Boy Caprice and his gang. But watch out for their traps hidden around every corner. Choose your weapon track down the ugly mobsters and brace yourself for the fight of your life.
